page.title: 14CREDITS
page.content: The work on this block was undertaken by Mrs Lystra Berrett,Mrs Mary Boyce,Mrs Chris Little and Mrs Betty Merther of Steeple Ashton W.I.and Michael Green,Headmaster of Steeple Ashton School.The following people have helped by giving information, etc.:- Mrs Jean Morrison and Mrs Elizabeth Seymour of Bratton W.I. Philip and Rosemary Pepler (farmers), Peter Gale (farmer), Godfrey Smith (farmer and naturalist) and the farm manager of Stoke Hill Farm.Books consulted included Landscape of Wessex by J.H.Bettey,Geology of Wiltshire by R.S.Barron and the Official Guide to West Wiltshire quoting W.T.Watkins.
